reviewText: My 4 year old LOVES this cartoon. He dressed as Nanoboy for Halloween and told everyone he was the superhero of the microscopic universe. It is educational and action packed, perfect for you scientifically curious little ones. I am surprised more people don't know about it!

The New Adventures of Nanoboy, the world's smallest superhero  With simple art and animation this little DVD will entertain your kids for a long time. The thing I like is that the story also captures the adult's attention and does not have the annoying voices some children's entertainment has. The crises in the film are child-sized and not too scary. Good for about ages 5 - 8.
